abstract: Piaggio MP3 front suspension for single-track vehicles like motorcycles uses a patented parallelogram linkage to retain maneuverability, but offers reliable traction and stability.
snippet: The Piaggio MP3 front suspension uses a parallelogram linkage to keep the maneuverability of a single front wheel, but with the reliable traction and stability of two
lead_paragraph: The Piaggio MP3 front suspension uses a parallelogram linkage to keep the maneuverability of a single front wheel, but with the reliable traction and stability of two

headline.main: A Design That Lets Two Wheels Act as One
headline.print_headline: A Design That Lets Two Wheels Act as One
headline.seo: A Design That Lets Two Wheels Act as One
